params._account: The address to burn kresko assets for
params._burnAmount: The amount of the Kresko asset to be burned.
params._kreskoAsset: The address of the Kresko asset.
params._mintedKreskoAssetIndex: The index of the collateral asset in the user's minted assets array.

burnKreskoAsset(address,address,uint256,.notice: Burns existing Kresko assets.Only needed if burning all principal debt of a particular collateral asset.

userdoc.notice: Main end-user functionality concerning burning of kresko assets
